He joined Paglaum MPC just last year because of its benefits given to members. He has applied for 10,000 PHP to buy additional grocery items like basic commodities to sell. 

He hopes that someday his sari-sari store can become a grocery store with restaurant and videoke bar.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of basic commodities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm implements and farm inputs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a plot for planting trees to produce food crops

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 57 years old, married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Edna has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from restaurant and direct selling.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Enelyn

texts.en:
Enelyn is married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Enelyn is 53 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines. Enelyn requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials like linen, zippers etc for her tailoring shop.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business. 

Enelyn has been in this business for 4 years.  In the future, Enelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials like linen, zippers etc for her tailoring shop

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Evelyn is 42 years old and has four children who are in school.

Evelyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Evelyn has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a solar kit to light her business.

loans.name: Khen's Group

texts.en:
Khen is aged 47 and a mother of four children, living in Kampong Cham province. She has been a cassava and rice farmer for more than five years and these businesses provide her with about 49,600KHR per day. 

Now her family is faced with a problem of having not enough money to pay for labor and plowing fees for doing farming, so she decided to lead a group to take a Kiva loan to fulfill her needs. She hopes this loan will help her to grow her business and the ability to renovate her old house.

loans.use: to pay for labor and plowing fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Jesús es un hombre de 58 años de edad, es un hombre alegre, que se esfuerza mucho por su trabajo, por su familia, por atender bien a un cliente y que este quede satisfecho, vende productos ambulantemente en su puesto de comidas rápidas, vende perros calientes, salpicón y juego de guanábana  este ha  sido el trabajo que desempeña desde 1980, un enorme recorrido en el cual ha podido conocer personas y generar confianza entre sus clientes, se estaciona cerca de un colegio.

Jesús vive con su pareja, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, este hombre sale desde tempranas horas de la madrugada, hasta altas horas de la tarde que finaliza la temporada estudiantil.

La idea de Jesús es que debido a su recorrido tener más carros de venta autorizados y avalados por él donde pueda contratar ayudantes que cubran colegios donde puede vender todo ello para buscar recursos para mejorar las condiciones de vivienda, puesto que siempre ha vivido de la misma manera.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como salsas, panes, salchichas, frutas para el salpicón y guanábana.
texts.en:
Jesús, age 58, is a happy man who puts forth great effort for his work, for his family, and for tending to his customers well so that they are satisfied.  He is a street vendor who sells fast food at his stand.  He sells hot dogs, ‘salpicón’ [shellfish cocktail], and ‘guanábana’ [a fruit] juice.  He has been engaged in this work since 1980.  It has been a very long run in which he has been able to meet people and generate confidence with his customers.  He parks close to a school.

Jesús lives with his life partner, and he has two adult children.  This man leaves in the early hours of the morning and works until late in the evening when school is done.

Jesús’s got an idea from his work experience to have more sales carts that are authorized and endorsed to sell by him.  He would be able to hire helpers to cover schools where they can sell.  This is all to seek resources to improve living conditions, given that he has always lived in the same way.

He is requesting a loan to buy products like salsas, bread, sausages and fruit for the salpicón and guanábana.

loans.use: to buy products like salsas, bread, sausages and fruit.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is 58 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, shampoo, eggs, coffee, etc.

Estrella has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Estrella would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, shampoo, eggs, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Diana

texts.en:
Diana is married and has three children. (One of them is in the above photo.) She is a smallholder farmer from Bomet, Kenya, and she has been farming for 15 years. 

This year, Diana started commercial poultry farming with 10 heads of poultry. For the poultry business to have significant returns, she needs to add more hens. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy poultry. She has plans of growing and diversifying her farm.

loans.use: To buy poultry.

loans.name: Armelita

texts.en:
Armelita is 55 years old, married, and has four children. Three of her children are in school.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Armelita has been raising pigs for three years now and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Armelita requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feeds for her pigs.

In the future, Armelita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feeds for her pigs.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es una mujer de 22 años de edad, es soltera tiene un hijo de cinco años, está linda familia vive en una comunidad de Nahuala.
Manuela con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la venta de licuados en la plaza de su comunidad, ella tiene dos años de realizar esta labor.
Manuela es una mujer muy amable y que atiende a sus clientes con respeto y educación, ella ahora solicita un préstamo para poder adquirir una refrigeradora que lo utilizara en su negocio de venta de licuados.
El gran sueño de Manuela es poder hacer de su negocio  algo más grande y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuela, age 22, is single and has a five year old son.  This lovely family lives in a community in Nahuala.

In order to get income and to get her family ahead, Manuela sells smoothies at the plaza in her community.  She has been doing this work for two years.  Manuela is a very kind woman, and she tends to her customers with respect and good manners.

She is now requesting a loan in order to be able to get a refrigerator, which she will use in her business of selling smoothies.

Manuela’s big dream is to be able to make her business bigger and to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Nematjon

texts.ru:
Неъматчон из района Шахритус. Он хочет расширить свою животноводческую деятельность в районе.  Ему 38 год. Он хочет взять кредит, и  за счет кредита приобрести скота для расширения бизнеса.  Он занимался этим делом с детства и посей день. У него 10 летный опыт работы. Неъматчон  считает, что животноводства не даст бездельничать и лениться. 
Неъматчон женат и отец четверых детей. Детям 13, 8, 6 и 4 года. Дети учатся в средней школе. Жена дехканка. Неъматчону хотелось бы научить своих старших детей  этой виде деятельности и передать свой опыт. Пока они маленькие, Неъматчон решился расширить свой бизнес и довести до совершенства до взросления Детей.
texts.en:
Nematjon is from the Shahrituz region. He wants to expand his animal rearing business in the area. He is 38 years old. He wants to take a loan and use it to buy livestock to expand his business. He has been in this business from his childhood to this day. He has ten years of experience. Nematjon believes that rearing animals will not let him be idle and lazy.

Nematjon is married and the father of four children. His children are thirteen, eight, six and four years old. His children go to school. Nematjon would like to teach his elder children how to do this type of work and pass on his experience. While they are still little, Nematjon has decided to expand his business and perfect it by the time they grow up.

loans.use: to buy livestock and expand his animal rearing business.

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en:
Janeth is 41 years old, married, and has five children. She lives in Upper Dicayas, Dipolog. 

Janeth operates a fishing business and owns fish cages. She earns a meager income each month doing this type of work, supporting the needs of her family, especially now that her children are in college. 

Janeth requested a loan for 14,900 PHP, which she will use to repair her fishing boat and maintain other fishing equipment to improve and expand her fishing business. In the future, she hopes to see all her children finish their studies and to concrete her house.

loans.use: to repair her fishing boat and maintain other fishing equipment to improve and expand her fishing business.

loans.name: Lyuba

texts.ru: Люба женщина 50 лет. Замужем. Мать двоих детей. В каждой таджикской семьи имеется национальная печь, которая называется “тандыр”. И женщины выпекают дома ароматные лепешки для своей семьи.  Домашние лепешки готовятся по особо традиционной рецептуре. До сих пор запах и вкус свежей испеченной лепешки манит  своим вкусным ароматом. В семье где есть дети специально для них  выпекаются маленькие лепешечки. И каждый ребенок должен съесть  испеченную для него маленькую лепешку. Это тоже одна из традиции нашего народа. Это гласит о том чтобы вся дальнейшая жизнь ребенка была полноценной. Таджикский народ чтит каждую крошку хлеба. Наша Люба тоже с детства помогала своей маме готовить хлеб.  Она учила свою дочку лепить лепешки. Маленькая Люба с радостью и трудолюбием лепила лепешечки для себя и братьев. Люба выйдя замуж решила помочь своей семье.  Для улучшения семейного состояния она начала выпекать лепешки. У нее имеются свои клиенты по продаже ее продукции на рынке. С наступившим сезоном свадебных мероприятий у Любы увеличились заказы. Для покупки угля, сырья и нового тандыра ей требуется денежные средства. И с этой целью она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Получив кредит она расширит объем своей продукции.
texts.en:
Lyuba is a 50-year old married woman and the mother of two. Each Tajik household has a traditional [clay] oven known as “tandyr.” Women bake aromatic flatbread for their families using a traditional national recipe. The aroma of a freshly baked flatbread is mouth-watering. In families with small children, special small flatbread is baked. Children are expected to eat this special bread, which, according to tradition, brings good luck for their future.  Tajik people value every crumb of bread. Our Lyuba also used to help her mother bake flat bread as a child. Her mother taught her baking. When Lyuba was young she enjoyed baking small flatbeads for herself and her brothers and worked hard at it. 

After getting married, Lyuba decided to help contribute to the household budget, and started baking flatbread. She has loyal customers who buy her bread at the market. Now that the wedding season has started, Lyuba is getting more orders. She needs financing to buy charcoal, ingredients and a new tandyr oven. This is why she has applied to Arvand for a loan. After receiving this loan, she will increase her production volume.

loans.use: to buy baking ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Evangie

texts.en:
Evangie is 47 years old, married and has nine children, five of whom are in school.  

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Evangie requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed for her pigs.

Evangie has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Evangie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feed for her pigs

loans.name: Croselita

texts.en:
Croselita works hard to support her family. Croselita is married with four children and has a pig raising business in the Philippines.

Croselita requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Croselita has been in this business for 10 years now, and also earns additional income from buying and selling vinegar.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Gloria is 35 years old and has one child in school.

Gloria has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8500 loan amount through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Gloria has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, Gloria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Amparo De Jesus

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Amparo es una mujer que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, ella siempre está dispuesta a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales en su finca.

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.
 Ella desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca lechera que le de un buen impulso a su negocio y de esta forma tener unos mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Working in the fields is one of the most difficult jobs today, due to the great effort needed to make progress, but Amparo is a woman who has never given up, despite the weather or other circumstances that may arise. She is always prepared to seek resources for her family.

She gets up first thing in the morning to perform the necessary work on her farm. In addition to this, she sells milk that she gets from her own cows. She hopes to increase her working capital to support her businesses. 

This is why she is requesting a loan which she will invest in a milk cow. This will give a boost to her business and in turn she will have a better income.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow, which will give a boost to her business and provide her a better income.

loans.name: Mamat

texts.ru: Мамат 57-летный житель района Шахритус. Шахритус находится на юго-западной части Таджикистана и имеет хорошие погодные условия для ведения сельского хозяйства. Мамат проживает здесь давно. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Сыновьям 38 и 19 лет. Тарший сын женат и имеет детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Мамат предоставляет услуги такси в районе. И он свободное время  занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота более 8 лет. Он покупает молодых телят, откармливают их несколько месяцев, и потом вывозит на продажу. Ему в этом помогают его сыновья. Целью данного кредита является развитие животноводческой деятельности. Мамат планирует увеличить поголовье скота и тем самым улучшить условия жизни семьи.
texts.en: Mamat is a 57-year-old resident of the Shahrituz region. Shahrituz is in the south-western part of Tajikistan and has good weather conditions for agriculture. Mamat has lived here for a long time. He is married and has two children. His sons are 38 and 19 years old. His elder son is married and has children. His wife is a housewife. Mamat himself provides a taxi service in the area, and he has been rearing cattle in his spare time for over eight years. He buys young calves, fattens them up for a few months, and then transports them for sale. His sons help him with this. The purpose of this loan is to develop his animal rearing business. Mamat plans to increase the size of his herd and in so doing improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy livestock and increase his herd.

loans.name: Salohiddin

texts.en: Salohiddin is a bright, hardworking, goal-oriented man. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1974. He is living in a rural area with his family. He is married and has two children. Their standard of living is very bad, and his wife is sick, so he has to buy medicine each month. He tried to earn money abroad, but he could not work abroad. Now he keeps livestock and plants vegetables. He hopes to have a good harvest for the next season. He appealed to IMON and Kiva lenders for a loan to buy medicine for his wife and food for his family. He hopes Kiva lenders will support him so he can feed his family and treat his wife.

loans.use: to buy medicine for his wife and food for his family.

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфирату  29 лет, и она жительница района Шахритус.  Она замужем и мать одного маленького сына. Ребенку 2 года.  У Махфират  имеется  место продажи на рынке, и она  занимается продажей детских одежды. Она занимается этой деятельности  3 года. Махфират целеустремленная женщина. Она не хотелась сидеть дома и решила работать и помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Махфират планирует,  привозит больше детские одежды, чтобы расширить свою деятельность и привлечь  себе больше клиентов.  Из-за нехватки денег она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы достичь своих целей.
texts.en:
Mahfirat is 29 and a resident of the Shahrituz region. She is married with one young son, who is two. She has a retail space at the market where she sells children's clothing, a business she has been operating for three years. She is a purposeful woman and didn't want to sit at home, so she decided to work and help her husband provide for the family.

Mahfirat is planning to bring in more children's clothing in order to expand her business and attract more clients. Since she doesn't have enough money she is looking for a loan to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to bring in more children's clothing and expand her business

loans.name: Araceli Amparo

texts.es: Araceli de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee un taller de costuras desde 4 años el cual está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes que la buscan por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de variedad de tela, hilo, elásticos, botones, zippers  etc. Por mayor y así tener  mejor ingreso económico.
texts.en: Araceli is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She has had a sewing workshop for the past 4 years which is located in her home.  She has many customers that seek her out because of the quality with with she makes the clothing.  With the money she has earned from her work, she was able to resolve some household expenses.  She is requesting this loan to purchase a variety of fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, zippers, etc. wholesale and thus have a better economic income.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, zippers, etc. wholesale.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys 33 years old, supports a family of 4 members. She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 11 years earning an income of KES 12,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and improve family health care. 

Her hope is to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is 42 years old, married and supports a family of 6 members. 

He has been practicing concrete sales in the area for the last 7 years earning KES 17,000 per month. 

Thomas has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy construction tools for hiring out to needful constructors.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy construction tools for hiring out to needful constructors

loans.name: Maria Cenid

texts.es:
Mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder ofrecerles una buena educación a sus 2 hijos son las metas que motivan a levantarse y trabajar duramente a la señora Maria, quien con su negocio de cría de gallinas ponedoras ha logrado ser útil y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 

Maria buscando ser más competitiva, más prospera frente a la competencia, perdurar en el tiempo, mejorar las ventas, tener mayor existencia en su granja quiere solicitar un crédito para construir un galpón y comprar gallinas ponedoras y tener una producción de huevos más alta y ser una distribuidora a considerar.
texts.en:
To improve the condition of her house and to provide a good education for her two children are the goals that motivate Maria to get up and work hard. With her business of raising laying hens she has become a useful person and a support for her husband with the household expenses.

Maria is looking to be more competitive and more prosperous compared to the competition, still exist with the passing of time, improve her sales and have more stock on her farm. She wants to request a loan to construct a shed and buy haying hens to have greater egg production and be a distributor to consider.

loans.use: to buy laying hens to have higher egg production and be a distributor to consider.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is 35 years old and married with three children. With three children in school, Fe works very hard to provide for them. Fe has run a general store in the Philippines for two years where she sells a variety of items such as shampoo, soap, coffee, bread, condiments, canned goods and other groceries. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, to buy items to sell in her store such as condiments, canned goods, junk foods, and other groceries. In the future, Fe would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Ferilyn

texts.en:
Ferilyn is 32 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school, Ferilyn works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Ferilyn has been in this business for 1 year.

In the future Ferilyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of ten children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a raising pig business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Marilyn is borrowing PHP 8000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Hannington

texts.en:
Hannington is a rural client in Kyotera. He is predominantly a farmer who grows crops and rears a few goats and chickens on a small scale. 

He is a first time client at UGAFODE Microfinace, after he realised the need to improve his yields and increase his profit. The banana bacteria wilt, a recent common banana disease, had attacked his plantation and he was trying to revamp it by spreading with mulch and cow dung in order to improve the status. He anticipates a higher yield and increased sales and profit.

He is hard working and appreciative of the UGAFODE and Kiva support because he believes it is getting him on the route to development.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers for his banana plantation
